WorkItem.Description: Hiya, this has happened before on a few versions. When you add custom gemming for gear you can't get any of the JC Dragon's Eye gems. They pop up if you adjust the gemming templates but only for gemming suggestions, you can't edit them in youself.
WorkItem.Summary: Add custom gemming - Can't choose any JC gems?

Comments.Message: Are you sure you haven't filtered them out?

Or, if you have 3 equipped, and you're wanting to equip a "fourth", the JC gems are all defaulted to 0 value.  Tthey'll be at the bottom of the list, if you want to swap in a JC before clearing out one of your previous ones.

Also, ensure that you're selected JC as one of your two professions - it maybe hidden.

***Also, ensure that you're selected JC as one of your two professions - it maybe hidden.***

Solved, thanks
